articles.description: Twitter Blue is now available in India. Users can now access the company's paid services by paying ₹650 per month on the website platform, while for Android and iOS users, it will cost ₹900 per month. Twitter Blue will also bring many new features to users.
articles.content: Twitter, which was designed for short message posting, is gradually evolving. With the latest addition of its premium service Twitter Blue, the platform now allows its paid subscribers to post longer… [+1665 chars]
